title: Update: Man Wounded in Nov. 2 LR Shooting Dies
content:
LITTLE ROCK, Ark. - A man wounded in a shooting earlier this month has died.
In a news release issued Tuesday, the Little Rock Police Department (LRPD) reported that victim Fred Duhart, 38, died early Sunday morning at UAMS as a result of his injuries.
The LRPD says its Homicide Unit was notified and the investigation continues.
Duhart was one of five people injured in the incident that occurred late in the evening on Nov. 2 at 2111 Bragg Street. [See attached related story for more].
